scripts.rebuild: cd .. && yarn build && cd near-contract-standards && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf build && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:non-fungible-token: near-sdk build src/non-fungible-token-receiver.js build/non-fungible-token-receiver.wasm && near-sdk build src/non-fungible-token.js build/non-fungible-token.wasm
